top_comments.comment: Wow, this lady is bang on the nail, very well said.

I'm 0 for 4 with books coming in from the UK. One was 'lost in transit' and it's been over 6 weeks for another. Let's see if the others make it. We're talking just printed matter here. Customs?🤔 Nah...punishment.
Threatening the British is never a good strategy…

U.K.: I wanna be a 3rd country.
E.U.: Are you sure?

U.K.: I wanna be a 3rd country.
E.U.: Are you really sure?

U.K.: I wanna be a 3rd country.
E.U.: You know this is going to totally change the way you trade with us?

U.K.: I wanna be a 3rd country.
E.U.: Alright then. From now on, 3rd party country rules apply.

U.K. STOP PUNISHING US!

comments_since_last_sample.body: Just in time turns out to be, it might not arrive.
The Frogs have always tried to punish us and there's an election coming and their politicians have to show proof that they are doing us some visible damage .
